name: BourbonCocktails
0:
”Alexa, open Bourbon Cocktails”
”What's the recipe for a Bourbon Old Fashioned?”
”How do you make a Mint Julep?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bourbon cocktails
des: Let Bourbon Cocktails help you make the perfect Bourbon based drinks. Impress your friends and family with your ability to make an actually good Bourbon Old Fashioned. You'll also discover unique Bourbon recipes that are less common but amazingly delicious. We understand that generally, Bourbon is best on its own or with some ice, but for those times when you need to make Bourbon based drinks (like a Kentucky Derby watch party), Bourbon Cocktails is the perfect companion with your Alexa powered device. Bourbon, bourbon, bourbon!!!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
